statements: DELETE FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Bolognese';
DELETE FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Bolognese';
DELETE FROM cooking_instructions WHERE recipe_id = (SELECT recipe_id FROM recipe_table WHERE recipe_name = 'Lasagna');
DELETE FROM cooking_instructions WHERE recipe_id = 5 AND step_number = 3;
DELETE FROM cooking_times WHERE recipe_id = 1 AND cooking_time > '01:00:00';
DELETE FROM recipe_reviews WHERE rating <= 2 AND user_id = 3;
